snippet: The Elizabeth police pursued a group of robbery suspects on Friday, exchanging gunfire, but one man remained at large Friday night.
abstract: Four men are arrested in connection with an auto salvage shop robbery in Elizabeth, NJ, that led to a shootout with police; a fifth suspect involved in the armed robbery remains at large.
lead_paragraph: The Elizabeth police pursued a group of robbery suspects on Friday, exchanging gunfire, but one man remained at large Friday night.

headline.main: Four Men Are Arrested in New Jersey Gunfight
headline.print_headline: Four Men Are Arrested In New Jersey Gunfight
